name: Elon Musk
title: The Architect
description: The first node in the network. Drag, rotate, and export your own interpretation of technology's most polarizing figure. A kinetic 3D portrait exploring the duality of innovation and disruption.
lore: In the shadow of rockets and algorithms, one figure rewired the fabric of industry. From electric dreams to neural links, the Architect builds futures most dare not imagine — or fear to inhabit.
medium: Interactive 3D WebGL — Three.js, custom shaders, particle systems

name: Julian Assange
title: The Revealer
description: The second node approaches. A figure who turned transparency into a weapon and information into revolution.
lore: Behind embassy walls and encrypted channels, the Revealer tore open the vaults of power. Every leaked cable, every published truth — a crack in the armor of the machine.

name: Vitalik Buterin
title: The Decentralizer
description: The network expands. A mind that conceived a world beyond centralized control — where code is law and trust is algorithmic.
lore: From a whitepaper scrawled in a teenager's notebook emerged a universe of smart contracts and decentralized dreams. The Decentralizer didn't just build a blockchain — he imagined a new social contract.

name: Warren Buffett
title: The Oracle
tagline: Patient capital in an impatient world
description: The penultimate node. An oracle of value in a world obsessed with velocity — proof that patience is its own form of disruption.
lore: While the world chased moonshots, the Oracle sat in Omaha and let compound interest do the work. A contrarian in a sea of hype, his weapon was time itself.

name: Edward Snowden
title: The Whistleblower
tagline: The final node completes the network
description: The final node completes the network. A single act of conscience that shattered the illusion of digital privacy forever.
lore: One man, one thumb drive, one flight to nowhere. The Whistleblower didn't just expose surveillance — he forced the world to confront the true cost of the connected age. The epochalypse approaches.
